triples.name: Contrastive Hebbian learning
triples.relevance: Contrastive learning has historical origins in contrastive Hebbian learning from the 1990s, which is reviewed in the paper.

triples.name: Self-supervised learning
triples.relevance: The paper discusses contrastive learning's role in self-supervised representation learning, a key application domain.

triples.name: Similarity learning
triples.relevance: Metric learning, which encompasses similarity learning, is reviewed as a foundational domain for contrastive learning.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper reviews applications of contrastive learning in the natural language processing domain.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: Computer vision is identified as a primary domain where contrastive learning has achieved recent success in self-supervised learning.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how contrastive learning has been applied in reinforcement learning as an example application.

triples.name: Audio signal processing
triples.relevance: The paper reviews applications of contrastive learning in audio processing as one of the example domains.
